title: Sidewall - Sample, "Marbalia", 1957
description: Hand marbled papers in various colors: 103) green and ocher on green, pattern number BM-2033; 104) blue and silver on black, no. BM-44G; 105) black and gold on red, no. BM-2035; 106) pink, lavender and gold on pink, no. MC-97; 107) black, gold and brown on tan, no. M-2036; 108) yellow, orange and brown on yellow, no. M-2030; 109) black, gold and red on red, no. BM-2031.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall - Sample, "Marbalia", 1957.
1957. Handpainted paper. Gift of Laverne International. 1969-55-1-103/109.
